comment._content: This is New York City's Trinity Church (Richard Upjohn, 1846). Excuse the self-linking, but here's a panorama showing the modern interior.

comment.author: 14173216@N07
comment._content: "Coronation" ceremony? In an Episcopal cathedral? I doubt it. Might have been an ordination or bishop's investiture.

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Anglican, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Yes, stefkagoil, certainly not a coronation.  Possibly a celebration ceremony for the coronation of George V, June 1911.
